Description:
HeadLine : Near Coral Bay Beach

Location : Located in Pegeia, Aqua Sol Holiday Village & Water Park is by the sea, a 3-minute drive from Coral Bay Beach and 7 minutes from Maa-Paliokastro Archaeological Site. This 4-star hotel is 6.3 mi (10.1 km) from Tombs of the Kings and 8.2 mi (13.2 km) from Paphos Harbour.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 149 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs with rainfall showerheads.

Dining : All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Grab a bite to eat at Aphrodite, one of the hotel s many dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/cafe. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges.
